description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(992).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,126,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: -(x^2-2*x-1) / (x^4-126*x^2+1). - _Colin Barker_, Dec 25 2013a(n) = 126*a(n-2) - a(n-4) for n>3. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 01 2014
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,2,125,252]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 126*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 01 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
